tooltip module

class tooltip.Tooltip(widget)[source]

Bases: object

hide()[source]

Hides the window

show(text)[source]

Displays text in tooltip window.

Parameters:

text – the text to display

tooltip.bind_tooltip(widget, text)[source]

Binds events to the widget given as parameter :param widget: the widget to bind the events to :param text: the text to show on hover
